item.title: Minecraft server PMMP on Raspberry Pi 4B
item.description: I’ve purchased the new Raspberry Pi 4B (4GB model) with a slick Flirc case which is also a passive-cooled alu case and it looks good on my table. The idea is to run Minecraft server for Windows 10, iOS, Android, XBox and PS4 edition (which launched yesterday). First things first, wihich server software to install. Microsoft has an alpha build of Bedrock Server but unfortunately builds are only for x86_64 (Windows and Linux), this is ARM.
